title: Evolutionary Educational Psychology: Classroom-Applied Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic educational theories and understanding of human developmental stages
context.additional_context: Provision of virtual environments for pre-service teachers to experience evolutionary psychology principles in real classroom situations

learning_goals: Can explain differences in cognitive processes between language acquisition and mathematics learning from an evolutionary perspective
Can analyze how students' self-concept is influenced by physical characteristics and social relationships
Can understand the evolutionary origins of problematic behaviors like bullying and design prevention strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
